title: Quiz 3 - Puzzles
instruction:
Directions (Q. 21 – 25): Study the following information carefully and answer the question given below.

There are eight boxes which are painted in different colours, viz Black, Maroon, Grey, Brown, Purple, Pink, Magenta and Violet.

Each of them contains a number written on them from 1 to 8, according to which they are placed one above the other. The box containing number 1 is at the bottom and the one above it is numbered 2 and so on. Each box contains different fruits, viz Apple, Grapes, Guava, Banana, Cherry, Apricot, Blackberry and Date but not necessarily in the same order.

There is only one box between the Maroon box and the one which contains Cherry. There are three boxes between the Brown box and the one which contains Apricot. The number written on the Grey box is odd and is placed above the box which contains Apricot. The number on the Pink box is odd and is placed somewhere above the box numbered four. The number 4 is written on the Violet box. The box which contains Blackberry is placed immediately above the Magenta box, which contains neither Apricot nor Apple. The purple box does not contain Blackberry. The box which contains Date is placed immediately above the one which contains Grapes, but not at the topmost position. There is only one box between the Pink box and the one which contains Guava. There are three boxes placed between the Magenta and Black boxes. The number of boxes placed above the Pink box is the same as the number of boxes placed between the Brown and Pink boxes. There is only one box between the one which contains Date and the Violet box. There are two boxes between the Grey box and the one which contains Apple.

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations is/are not true?
options: N – Civics – Saturday – Kolkata
M – Geography – Friday – Kanpur
O – Chemistry – Monday – Ranchi
Both [1] and [2]
None of these

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: O – Patna
K – Bhopal
N – Delhi
P – Kanpur
J – Lucknow

options: K
J
P

The one who belongs to Patna

S, W

quiz.text: Which of the following is matched correctly?
options: W – 3rd floor – Union Bank – PO
V – 7th floor – Union Bank - Manager
S – 5th floor – UCO Bank - Clerk
R – 2nd floor – Andhra Bank – Manager
All are true

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true?
options: The box of Magenta colour is placed immediately below the one which contains Banana.
The Black box is placed at the third position.
The box which contains Grapes is placed at the lowermost position.
The Purple box is placed at the second position.
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following fruits is contained in the Grey box?
options: Apple
Date
Blackberry
Guava
None of these

quiz.text: How many boxes are there between the Violet box and the one which contains Apricot?

None
One
Three

quiz.text: Which box is placed immediately below the Magenta box?
options: The box which contains Apricot
The box which is of Maroon colour
Both [1] and [2]
The box which contains Blackberry
None of these

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that doesn’t belong to that group?
options: Purple – Guava
Grey – Blackberry
Pink – Apricot
Maroon – Banana
Brown – Grapes
